title: Israel Banks Balance Sheet
description: Banks Balance Sheet in Israel decreased to 2362843 ILS Million in August from 2367876 ILS Million in July of 2022. Banks Balance Sheet in Israel averaged 1462470.79 ILS Million from 2008 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 2367876 ILS Million in July of 2022 and a record low of 1037203.10 ILS Million in January of 2009. This page provides the latest reported value for - Israel Banks Balance Sheet - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: Bank of Israel
